channel.title: What do i do? the tutorial is so vuage
channel.description:
i just dodnload chassy's Chassyscape it came with lots of things yet i want to play on it but i dont know how to. [b]i ran the Compiler.BAT Then i ran the Runserver.BAT[/b] so ive done everything i can do right? so how do i play on my server? is my server even RUNNNING? theres also a Voule Auto Restarter but im pretty sure i dont need that.
Can sombody please tell me what i do need?

item.title: What do i do? the tutorial is so vuage
item.dc:creator: @yeesnaw yeesnaw
item.description:
@yeesnaw wrote:

thanks alot =] im in, but when i go onto my brothers pc and type in my no-ip i can’t fair enough but still, are there any tutorials on how i can make a client?

Read full topic
item.source: What do i do? the tutorial is so vuage

item.title: What do i do? the tutorial is so vuage
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

yeesnaw:

i dont get what your saying, do i put this into the webclient? and ive tryed doing that already.

no.

you download a source, which you have.

you have java, so now you need to set your enviroments. (check the tut) and change it to ur java.
this will make your compiler work when you want to update it.

you will need a client or use silab. either is fine atm.

you have to login to ur server by opening your run.bat. you then login with ip 0.0.0.0 or 127.0.0.1

when you want to make it live, you will need to make a no-ip for people to login ur server with the ip you make.

you then need to portfoward, or use utorrent. either are fine as they both do the same thing.

you can make a webclient, but you dont need one.

you can use silab for ur server to run on,

you can use a client that you will need to edit to make it fit your server for your server to run on,

or you can make a webclient for your server to run on.

Read full topic
item.source: What do i do? the tutorial is so vuage

item.title: What do i do? the tutorial is so vuage
item.dc:creator: @yeesnaw yeesnaw
item.description:
@yeesnaw wrote:

i dont get what your saying, do i put this into the webclient? and ive tryed doing that already and it just gave me and “error connecting to server” but it said that it was in the Run.BAT box.
don’t i need a client? and where can i get one of those.

Read full topic
item.source: What do i do? the tutorial is so vuage

item.title: What do i do? the tutorial is so vuage
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

to run a server, you do not need your compiler open.

all you need is your run.bat open and you can login with 0.0.0.0 or 127.0.0.1…

then when you make a no-ip and portfoward or use utorrent, you can host it for live.

Read full topic
